# controlPointBufferOffset

**Instance Property**

The offset, in bytes, to the control point data in the buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var controlPointBufferOffset: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

The offset needs to be a multiple of the format element size you configure with the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLAccelerationStructureCurveGeometryDescriptor/controlPointFormat] property. You also need to align the offset to the platform’s buffer alignment requirement.
